name: Alive (itch) (RemoticGames)
description:
Alive is a game in which you are placed in a randomly generated labyrinth filled with distorted, nightmarish creatures and the only way out is to collect 10 of the orbs that are scattered around before you a captured by one of the monstrosities that plague the halls.

Controls:

W/A/S/D - To move.

F - To turn on and off flashlight.

Shift- To run.

Created in UE4
